review: 동대문 흥인지문에 다녀왔어요 지하철 1호선 동대문역에 내리면 돼요 우리나라 보물1호로 조선시대 건축물이에요 조선시대에 한양을 보호하는 8문 가운데 하나입니다. 흥인지문은 8개의 문 가운데 동쪽에 있는 문이다. 태조 이성계가 최초 지었고 이후 몇차례손질도 보고 고쳐짓기도 했었다합니다
review_en: I went to Heunginjimun Gate in Dongdaemun. You can get off at Dongdaemun Station on Subway Line 1. It is Korea's No. 1 treasure and it is a building of the Joseon Dynasty. It is one of the eight gates that protects Hanyang during the Joseon Dynasty. Heunginjimun Gate is the gate to the east of the eight gates. King Taejo Lee Seong-gye first built it, and since then, he has seen the work done and corrected it several times.

review: 남대문에 이어 방문. 우리나라 보물 1호임에도 불구하고 잘 살펴보지 않으면 그냥 지나쳐 버릴 수도 있음. 남대문에 비해 다소 관리가 부실한 것처럼 보임.
review_en: a visit following Namdaemun Even though it is Korea's No. 1 treasure, if you don't take a good look, you might just pass it by. Seem to be somewhat poorly managed compared to Namdaemun Gate.

review: 국보1호 숭례문, 보물1호 흥인지문. 파리에 개선문에 있다면 서울에는 4개의 문이 존재한다. (뭐 지어진 이유는 다르지만...) 우리민족 뿌리를 눈으로 증명하는 각 문들은 지금은 많이 초라해져버렸다. 특히 숭례문은 10년 전 방화로 상처와 아픔만 남은 국보가 되었다. 우리 뿌리를 말없이 웅변하는 동대문은 건강하게 지금처럼만 남아있길 바랄 뿐이다.
review_en: National Treasure No. 1 Sungnyemun, Treasure No. 1 Heunginjimun. If there is a Arc de Triomphe in Paris, there are four gates in Seoul. (What was built for different reasons...) Each door that proves the roots of our people with its eyes is now much shabby. In particular, Sungnyemun Gate became a national treasure with only wounds and pain due to arson 10 years ago. Dongdaemoon, who speaks our roots silently, can only hope to remain healthy and as it is now.

From some point on, Dongdaemun bonded clothes became too expensive and I didn't want to be crowded, so I didn't go often. There will be a new duty-free shop in Dongdaemun, so it will be fun to visit there.

review: 흥인지문에서 바로 한양도성을 5분정도만 따라 걸어 올라가면 동대문과 그이왜 시내가지가 한눈에 아름답게 펼쳐진다. 시간이 많지않다면 잠깐 휴식을 취하고 내려올수 있고 좀더 시간이 있다면 도성을 쭉 따라 계속 걸으면 옛 역사의정취와 함께 아름다운 서울 풍경들을 볼수 있을것이다

If you don't have much time, you can take a short break and come down. If you have more time, you can keep walking along the city wall and see the beautiful scenery of Seoul along with the old historical atmosphere.

Traffic is also very important, so it is just in the middle of the main road connecting Cheongnyangni with central Seoul. That's why the traffic is always heavy throughout the day. Traffic can be congested even at midnight.

Especially, the night view is really nice. But since there are many clothing wholesale markets nearby, there are so many motorcycles, so you should pay attention to traffic. You can't go inside Dongdaemun, but there's a space in the back, so you can see it very close.
